title: Unable to specify dependency by hash
body:
Hello, I'm trying to install lammps with an mvapich2 that is already installed, but Spack still tries to rebuild mvapich2. Am I missing something needed here?

```bash
[spack@login03 ~]$ spack find -l -f mvapich2
==> 3 installed packages.
-- linux-centos7-x86_64 / gcc@6.3.0 -----------------------------
qmt35td mvapich2@2.2%gcc

er3die3 mvapich2@2.2%gcc ldflags="-L/cm/shared/apps/slurm/current/lib64" 


-- linux-centos7-x86_64 / intel@17.0.4 --------------------------
2hro7lm mvapich2@2.2%intel ldflags="-L/cm/shared/apps/slurm/current/lib64" 

[spack@login03 ~]$ spack install --restage lammps %gcc@6.3.0 ^mvapich2/er3die3
==> libpciaccess is already installed in /hpc/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/libpciaccess-0.13.5-uwak3icfpwpnppl643wooiqa4mykd5rg
==> bison is already installed in /hpc/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/bison-3.0.4-7blhnzv2yrbjgt5rl2vzxsxiul7kmzmy
```
